sentences.en: a shrine to the Virgin Mary
sentences.cn: 敬奉圣母马利亚的朝圣地

sentences.en: At the shrine of the god there were offerings, libations and incense.
sentences.cn: 神殿里供奉着牺牲、鬯酒和贡香。

sentences.en: At their request they were made the guardians of the shrine of Zeus.
sentences.cn: 在这对老夫妻的要求下,他们成了宙斯圣殿的守护神.

sentences.en: At this, their own shrine, he knelt with them, an ardent devotee.
sentences.cn: 他像一名忠实的信徒, 和她们一起拜倒在这神龛面前.

sentences.en: Elvis’ home has become a shrine for his fans.
sentences.cn: 猫王的故居成了歌迷的朝圣地。

sentences.en: He also built there a shrine.
sentences.cn: 他还在那里建了一座寺庙.

sentences.en: his pilgrimage to the shrine of St John
sentences.cn: 他去敬奉圣约翰的圣地朝圣

sentences.en: Its summit is crowned by a small shrine.
Many pilgrims knelt piously at the shrine.
sentences.cn: 许多朝圣者心虔意诚地在神殿跪拜.

sentences.en: Shakespeare's birth place is visited as a shrine.
sentences.cn: 莎士比亚的诞生地被参观者视作圣地.

sentences.en: So of course I dashed impetuously to the shrine to pay homage.
sentences.cn: 一听这话,我当然性急地冲到这个神殿来表示敬意.

sentences.en: The monument has been turned into a shrine to the dead and the missing.
sentences.cn: 这座纪念碑已成为人们纪念那些死者和失踪者的神圣之地。

sentences.en: The offerings made at his shrine were without number.
sentences.cn: 他收到的礼物简直是难以数计.

sentences.en: The shrine was an object of pilgrimage.
sentences.cn: 这处圣地是人们朝圣的目的地.

sentences.en: They bowed down before the shrine.
sentences.cn: 他们在神龛前鞠躬示敬.

sentences.en: They visited the Shrine of Our Lady to pray for redemption.
sentences.cn: 他们参观了圣母马利亚的神龛,为赎罪而祈祷.

sentences.en: When the barge reached the shrine, acolytes removed the pall.
sentences.cn: 当驳船抵达圣地时，辅祭除去了柩衣。

words.tran_cn: 贮藏所,坟墓,纪念碑,庙,圣堂
将…置于神龛内；把…奉为神圣

trans.tran_en: a place that is connected with a holy event or holy person, and that people visit to pray

trans.tran_cn: 将…置于神龛内；把…奉为神圣
